overview: The story of a woman with healing powers. To save her best friend from a violent and tortuous relationship, they both decide to leave their small northern town for the big city, relying on their gift to survive. Not knowing that they would face the Machiavellian business of pharmaceutical laboratories, which will do whatever it takes to kill the new competition. The odyssey of this woman and her friend will lead them to know love, success and fame, but also the violence and ambition of a business that no longer has any conscience of morality or human welfare.
title: Tetoterapia, el musical
